data.title: Osmena, Sergio, 1878-1961
data.text:
Philippine Officials at the White House

President Harry S. Truman meets with Philippine officials at the White House. From left to right are President Harry S. Truman, President Sergio Osmena of the Philippines, Paul V. McNutt, and Carlos Romulo. From the scrapbooks of Matt Connelly, Vol. 1.

President Osmena with American Officials

From left to right, General William D. Styer, Secretary of War Robert P. Patterson and President of the Philippines Sergio Osmena meet in President Osmena's office. Donor: John Paxton.

Dignitaries Leaving the Malacanang Presidential Palace, Manila

From left to right, Philippine President Sergio Osmena, U.S. Secretary of War Robert P. Patterson, U.S. General Wilhelm D. Styer and U.S. General Russell leave the Presidential Palace in Manila together. Donor: John Paxton

Dignitaries Assembled at the Presidential Palace in Manila

(From L to R.) Philippine President Sergio Osmena, U.S. Secretary of War Robert P. Patterson, U.S. General Wilhelm D. Styer and U.S. General Russell at the Presidential Palace, Manila, Philippines. Donor: John Paxton

Photo of Admiral Chester Nimitz being awarded the Philippine Medal of Valor

Photo of President Sergio Osmena of the Philippines, left, awarding the Medal for Valor, highest Philippine decoration, to Fleet Admiral Chester W. Nimitz, center, as Admiral Ernest J. King, right, looks on. From: Beth Gore.

Photo of Paul V. McNutt being greeted by Philippine President Sergio Osmena

Paul V. McNutt (left) is greeted on porch of High Commissioner's residence at Manila as he arrives to take over duties of High Commissioner, by President Sergio Osmena. Mr. Osmena had arrived the day before to resume his position as President of the Philippines. From: Beth Gore.

Photo of President Sergio Osmena of the Philippines and Paul V. McNutt, U. S. Commissioner of the Philippines

Photo of President of the Commonwealth of the Philippines Sergio Osmena (right) arriving in this country for discussions on the rebuilding of his country. He is shown at Washington National Airport being greeted by Paul V. McNutt, Commissioner of the Philippines. From: Beth Gore.

Photo of President Truman and President Sergio Osmena of the Philippines conferring at the White House

Photo of President Harry S. Truman and President Sergio Osmena of the Philippines conferring at the White House. Left to right: President Truman, President Osmena, and Secretary of State Edward R. Stettinius. From: Beth Gore.

Photo of President Truman and President Sergio Osmena of the Philippines

President Harry S. Truman (left) and President Sergio Osmena of the Philippines as they conferred at the White House today. From: Beth Gore.
